text: Richy come here, is time to dinner!!!
I will turn you offline if you don't come right now!
Tsss... Suddenly the game stops, and... an offline popup shows up on the computer screen.
AAAA, what the f%&%$ I will kill my mom, AHHHH!!!
Hurry up, help Richy connect the router again!
Go down the stairs and on level 3 find the router and turn it ON, before is to late!
